mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD WHERE (BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%') OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%'))
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD WHERE (BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%') OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%'))

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD AS BOARD , TB_PROFILE AS PROFILE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC, BOARD_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD AS BOARD , TB_PROFILE AS PROFILE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_PROFILE JOIN (SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD UNION SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD) AS BOARD ON BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = TB_PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = #{profileSeq} ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD UNION SELECT * FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD) AS BOARD WHERE BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = #{profileSeq}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD AS BOARD , TB_PROFILE AS PROFILE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND (BOARD.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%') OR BOARD_CONTENT4SEARCHING LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%')) ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD AS BOARD , TB_PROFILE AS PROFILE WHERE BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ AND (BOARD.BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%') OR BOARD_CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchedWord},'%')) ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{offset}

SELECT BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE, NICK_NAME FROM TB_PROFILE JOIN (SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM TB_IT_TECH_BOARD UNION SELECT BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_SEQ, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DATE FROM TB_DEVELOP_STORY_BOARD) AS BOARD ON BOARD.BOARD_PROFILE_SEQ = TB_PROFILE.PROFILE_SEQ ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC LIMIT 3
